text: Lori Nelson (born Dixie Kay Nelson; August 15, 1933 â€“ August 23, 2020) was an American actress and model. She was active in the 1950s and early 1960s. She was best known for her roles in the TV series How to Marry a Millionaire and the movies Revenge of the Creature, All I Desire, and I Died a Thousand Times. Nelson died on August 23, 2020 from Alzheimer's disease-related problems in Los Angeles, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:Models from New Mexico Category:Actors from Santa Fe, New Mexico
title: Lori Nelson
